Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutMenu  
    AudioPlayer
    Audioplayer for game sounds.
    Block
    Block class that extends GameObject class
    FontLoader
    Class for loading fonts
    Game
    Entry point of the game
    GameCamera
    Game camera class that follows player
    GameObject
    GameObject interface
    GameOver  
    Goal
    GameObject goal, when player collides with it game ends
    GoalScreen
    Class is used to display goal screen
    GuiMonster
    Monster class
    GuiPlayer
    Class for GUI aspects of the player.
    Handler
    Handler is a class used for updating and storing GameObjects
    HandlerIO
    This class requests the home directory of the user from the system, and checks if the save directory userhome/rantamaki exists, and handles the writing and reading of the game's status file.
    HandlerIOTest  
    ImageLoader
    This class is used to load images to buffer
    InitCombat
    Monstrously huge class for dynamically creating combat related menus and viewing combat related information.
    KeyInput
    Class for handilng all keyboard inputs
    Menu
    Class for main menu
    MouseInput
    Class for handling all mouse inputs, used only in menus
    PauseMenu
    Class for pause menu
    SpriteSheet
    Class for spritesheets
    StartScreen
    Class for start screen
    Window
    Class that creates window with swing and where we render everything else with AWT
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ID
    All GameObject types
    STATE
    All possible game states except combat screen
